meanings.definition: The brain or its major divisions.
meanings.sent1: The encephalon controls our thoughts and actions.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the encephalon to understand how the brain works.
meanings.sent3: The encephalon must be well-protected, like a precious gem in a safe.
meanings.sent4: Her encephalon was a library of memories, each book a different experience.
meanings.sent5: The encephalon is like a complex computer, processing information at lightning speed.

meanings.definition: The portion of the vertebrate central nervous system enclosed in the skull.
meanings.sent1: A concussion can harm the encephalon and cause serious problems.
meanings.sent2: The encephalon is surrounded by the protective skull for safety.
meanings.sent3: The encephalon is like a delicate flower, needing gentle care to thrive.
meanings.sent4: His encephalon felt like a buzzing beehive, full of activity and energy.
meanings.sent5: The encephalon is the command center of the body, sending out signals to every part.
